main

Class AmrMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.AmrMain

  • public class AmrMain
extends Object
    Main class of the transition-based generator defined in the thesis. This class provides a command-line interface for generating sentences from a file containing AMR graphs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • generate

        public List<String> generate(List<Amr> amrs)
        Generates realizations from AMR graphs using the Generation algorithm as described in the thesis.
        Parameters:
        amrs - the AMR graphs for which realizations should be generated
        Returns:
        the list of generated realizations

      • generate

        public List<String> generate(List<Amr> amrs,
                             boolean firstStage,
                             boolean postProcess)
        Generates realizations from AMR graphs using the Generation algorithm as described in the thesis.
        Parameters:
        amrs - the AMR graphs for which realizations should be generated
        firstStage - whether first-stage processing (i.e. MERGE, SWAP, DELETE and KEEP transitions) should also be performed; in most cases, this parameter should be set to true but for hyperparameter optimization, it is more efficient to peform first-stage processing only once and leave the AMR graphs as is in subsequent calls to this function.
        postProcess - whether post-processing should be performed
        Returns:
        the list of generated realizations
